description: Partial approval of details application pursuant to condition 3 Materials) - part i only, in relation to Phase 2 of planning consent ref: P2019/3572/S73 dated 28/07/2020
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE: You are advised that this decision notice grants approval of part i) in relation to Phase 2 of Condition 3 (Materials) of planning permission ref: P2019/3572/S73 only. 

Parts a), b) c), d), e), f), g), h), and i) relating to Phase 1 of Condition 3 were approved via applications P2019/1812/AOD, P2019/2036/AOD, P2020/0488/AOD, P2019/2375/AOD, P2020/0243/AOD, P2019/2377/AOD, P2019/2378/AOD, P2019/2379/AOD, and P2020/0696/AOD respectively. 

Parts a), b) c), e), and f), relating to Phase 2 of Condition 3 were approved via application P2022/1046/AOD. 

You are advised that further details must be submitted in order to discharge parts d), g), and h) in relation to Phase 2 of condition 3 and in order to fully discharge condition 3.
